# Major Update Pull Request

This template is intended for **major changes** such as new features, architecture-level modifications, big refactors, or version increments.

## What’s New?
Describe the new features, improvements, or structural changes introduced in this update.

## Breaking Changes
List any backward-incompatible changes or required migrations.

## Testing
Explain how the new features or changes were tested:
- What tests were added?
- Coverage impact?
- Manual testing steps?

## Impact Assessment
Describe potential impacts on:
- Performance
- Compatibility
- User experience
- Existing modules

## Checklist
- [ ] All relevant tests have been added or updated
- [ ] The update respects the project’s coding style and architecture
- [ ] Documentation has been fully updated (README, wiki, code comments, API docs, etc.)
- [ ] No unused or experimental code left behind
- [ ] All breaking changes are clearly documented
- [ ] Dependencies updated if required
- [ ] Version number bumped appropriately (if using semantic versioning)
- [ ] I have manually tested critical paths
